Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 66th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1983...
Injured on 5/7/1986 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 7/8/1986 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/29/1986 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/25/1988 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1992, off Scott Terry (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1992, off Jimmy Key (LA)...
Injured on 8/9/1993 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Drove in 7 runs against Los Angeles on 9/9/1994...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1995...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (N) on 4/1/1996...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1996, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 9/25/1996...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (N) on 4/1/1997...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/10/1998 to a 4-year deal worth $2,130,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1998, hitting .396 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
